InstructionElement.h

00001 // $Id: InstructionElement.h 60 2009-06-15 06:46:22Z sibbernsen.dan $
00002 
00003 #ifndef INSTRUCTION_ELEMENT_H
00004 #define INSTRUCTION_ELEMENT_H
00005 
00006 #define BIT_MASK_MAX_SIZE 64
00007 
00008 #include <bitset>
00009 #include "Instruction.h"
00010 #include "InstructionSet.h"
00011 
00012 /*
00013         Design Pattern Used: Composite
00014     Class: InstructionElement
00015                  The Leaf portion of the Composite pattern.
00016                          Handles processing at the lowest level.
00017 */
00018 
00019 
00020 
00021 namespace BabelShark
00022 {
00023         class InstructionElement: public Instruction
00024         {
00025                 public:
00026                         InstructionElement(unsigned int size, char* name);
00027                         ~InstructionElement();
00028 
00029                         //virtual function, base definition does nothing.
00030                         //should be implemented by any class inheriting from it.
00031                         virtual void Interpret(char* buffer);
00032 
00033                         //virtual function, base definition does nothing.
00034                         //will be used to Display data to the WireShark output
00035                         virtual char* Display();
00036 
00037                         //virtual function, no implementation in base class
00038                         //used in the InstructionList class.
00039                         Instruction* GetChild();
00040 
00041                         //Creates a NullIterator because an InstructionElement
00042                         //should have no children.
00043             void CreateIterator();
00044 
00045             // takes an Input Size and forms a bitmask based on it.
00046             static std::bitset<BIT_MASK_MAX_SIZE> SetupBitMask(unsigned int val);
00047 
00048             // rounds up bit size to byte size
00049             unsigned int DetermineSizeInBytes(int bits);
00050                         
00051                         InstructionCollection::iterator GetIterator();
00052 
00053         protected:
00054             std::string _InterpretedData;
00055 
00056                 private:
00057                         //NullIterator has not been implented yet.
00058                         //when it is, this class is to construct an object
00059                         //of type NullIterator
00060             //NullIterator* nullIterator;
00061 
00062         };
00063 }
00064 
00065 #endif //INSTRUCTION_ELEMENT_H
